update tb_owner_luckdraw
luckdraw_name = #{luckdrawName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
luckdraw_allname = #{luckdrawAllname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update tb_owner_luckdraw set luckdraw_name = #{luckdrawName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, luckdraw_allname = #{luckdrawAllname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, luckdraw_telephone = #{luckdrawTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, luckdraw_status = #{luckdrawStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, luckdraw_grade = #{luckdrawGrade,jdbcType=INTEGER}, luckdraw_ifin = #{luckdrawIfin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, luckdraw_createTime = #{luckdrawCreatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, luckdraw_motifyTime = #{luckdrawMotifytime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where luckdraw_id = #{luckdrawId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select * from tb_owner_luckdraw order by luckdraw_id
mapper.update: update tb_owner_luckdraw set luckdraw_status = 0 where luckdraw_id >0
